Rulings.Edison:
●Dragon-Type monsters on both sides of the field are affected by Dragon Capture Jar.
●If Stop Defense is activated targeting a Dragon-Type monster, it is switched to Attack Position, but then is immediately changed back to Defense Position since the effect of Dragon Capture Jar is continuous.

Rulings.Base: 1. Dragon-Type monsters on both sides of the field are affected by "Dragon Capture Jar".\n2. If "Stop Defense" is activated targeting a Dragon-Type monster, it is switched to Attack Position, but then is immediately changed back to Defense Position since the effect of "Dragon Capture Jar" is continuous.
